full_summary:

The tender notice with the solicitation number 2023-00358, also known as PW-23-01025213, has been officially cancelled. All interested parties who submitted or planned to submit a proposal have been informed about this cancellation.

The cancellation notice includes details about the tender classification, classification system, trade agreements, regions of opportunity, and regions of delivery. If you require additional information or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact the contracting entity.

Thank you for your understanding, and we wish you all the best in your future business endeavors.
